items.sentence: Tom opened his suitcase and began unpacking.
Tom was lying to Mary when he told her that.
Tom was scared to go in the cave by himself.
Tom was supposed to go to Australia with me.
Tom was the first one to donate money to us.
Tom was the one who told me where you lived.
Did you write down the license plate number?
Do Tom and Mary both still enjoy doing that?
Do Tom and Mary read the same kind of books?
Tom hasn\'t had a fight with anybody lately.
How often does Tom help you wash the dishes?
I can only afford to make a partial payment.
Tom wanted to say something, but he didn\'t.
I promised myself I wouldn\'t do this again.
I wish there was something else we could do.
I wonder if Tom could tell us where Mary is.
Everyone looked at Tom to see what he\'d do.
Tom worked with Mary for almost three years.
Do you have any idea where I might find Tom?
Tom said that Mary wouldn\'t likely do that.
